page.shortlink: api client api a5 u element transition method

argument.name: element
argument.description: A pointer to a DOM element or the ID of an element.

property.name: from
property.description: The initial CSS values from which the transition will occur.

property.name: to
property.description: The target CSS values to transition to.

property.name: duration
property.description: The duration of the transition in number of milliseconds, or a CSS time value string (for example "1s"). The default is 500 milliseconds.

property.name: delay
property.description: The delay of the transition in number of milliseconds, or a CSS time value string (for example "1s"). The default is 0 milliseconds.

property.name: tween
property.description: The CSS timing function to use for the transition. The default is "ease".

argument.name: onComplete
argument.description: The function to call when the transition has completed. The scope of the function will be the element the transition occurs on.
